wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Loxton (birth registered third ¼ 1947) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Featherstone Rovers (Heritage № 431), Normanton ARLFC, Huddersfield, Keighley, Halifax and Bramley as a scrum-half or loose forward.
